cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.SI, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses a novel approach for learning Bayesian networks from data, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The approach involves explicitly representing and learning the local structure in the conditional probability tables (CPTs), which can be seen as a form of data mining (cs.DM). The paper also discusses the theoretical foundations and practical aspects of learning local structures, which can be considered as a form of statistical inference (cs.SI) and information theory (cs.IT).
